programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Kuni meeskond leiab jatkuvalt tõendeid, et nad võivad olla uleujutustunnelite lahedal, avastab tipptasemel maapinda labiv radar Money Pitis midagi, mis võiks olla raskesti ligipaasetav kõrvalkamber.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Asjad muutuvad hirmutavaks, kui muuja saabub koos Stephen Kingi kirjaga. Kas palju tood ja vahe mangu teeb Coreyst igava poisi? Corey kiidab Harrisonide peretraditsioonile takka, kui saabub James Bondi plakat. Kas ta luurab tehingut?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: "Iidsed tulnukad" loeb ules kumme tõenaolisemat kohta ule maailma, mis võivad varjata tulnukate baase, sealhulgas Antarktika jaa all asuv koobas, Hiinas asuv jarv, mis on UFOde lemmikpaigaks, ja puramiid Denali mae nõlvade all.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Dwight ja Tyesha komistavad animatroonilise turannosauruse otsa ja hakkavad seda tukeldama, samal ajal kui Doug haukab liialt suure suutaie, kui ta liigutab hiiglaslikku tagahoovis asuvat piraadilaeva stiilis mangumaja.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Natasha riskib kasumi ja ajaga, kui signaalid ristuvad massiivse raadiotorni mõõtmetega, samal ajal kui Dwight ja Tyesha kardavad tagajargi parast seda, kui superkangelaste kujud nende valve all ruustatakse.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Hiiglaslik animatrooniline olend, kellel on uhepaevane tahtaeg, tekitab Mollyle ja Russellile õudusunenagusid, samal ajal kui Tamara unistab magusast palgapaevast, viies ulisuure veinitunni riigi teise otsa.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Aastaid on eri kultuurides ule maailma levinud uskumus tahevaravate kohta, mille kaudu on Maale saabunud olendid universumi kaugetest punktidest ja isegi teistest dimensioonidest. Kas sellised varavad võivad tõesti eksisteerida?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: "Iidsed tulnukad" loeb ules kumme intrigeerivamat ja salaparasemat leitud sumbolit ja koodi, mis võivad sisaldada tõendeid kontaktist tulnukatega. Peruu kõrbes asuvatest gluufidest kuni spiraal-petrogluufideni, mis sisaldavad kõrgemat matemaatikat.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Poodi tuuakse Normandia invasiooni kasitsi joonistatud kaardid. Kas Corey suudab rinnet kaitsta või on sunnitud alla andma?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Varvime linna koos pandikunnidega punaseks, kui poodi tuuakse Monet maastikumaal. Ricki ajalootund Cinco de Mayo teemal ajab mehed hulluks ja võib juhtuda, et teda ei kutsuta iseenda fiestale.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Üle kogu maailma on keelatud "kolmnurgad" - salaparased piirkonnad, kuhu sisenevad laevad, lennukid ja inimesed, mis seejarel lihtsalt kaovad. Kas need kohad trotsivad fuusikaseadusi? Või on Maal tõesti mõned kohad, kuhu me lihtsalt ei tohi minna?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Parast enam kui tosin aastat kestnud otsinguid on meeskond võib-olla avastanud legendaarse Chappelli võlvkambri.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Šotimaa on aastaid olnud uleloomulike nahtuste epitsenter. See on koduks iidsetele kiviringidele, lugudele kummalistest olenditest ja kuulus paik, kus margatakse palju UFO-sid. Kas võib olla, et Šotimaa on maavaliste kulaliste magnet?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Iidsete astronautide teoreetikud Giorgio Tsoukalos, William Henry ja Jason Martell paljastavad kõige veenvamad tõendid iidsete lennumasinate kohta ja uurivad võimalust, et need maavalised kohtumised on aset leidnud labi aegade.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Dwightil ja Tyeshal on noorele ettevõtjale oluline saadetis, samal ajal kui Dougile tehakse ulesandeks transportida habras neoonreklaam uhele innukale kollektsionaarile Chicagos.

programme.title: Tulnukate rantšo
programme.desc: Parast uute tõendite avastamist kunka alla mattunud massiivsetest metallist objektidest viib meeskond Kolmnurgas labi eksperimendi, mis toob kaasa uhe kõige šokeerivama paljastuse, mida Skinwalkeri rantšos kunagi nahtud.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick teeb uuratult hea tehingu maali eest, mille on vaidetavalt loonud kunstnik Rene Magritte. Kuid selleks, et oma leiu autentsust tuvastada, peab ta koos Chumiga Belgiasse sõitma. Kas sellest saab "Pandikunnide" ajaloo suurim palgapaev?

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Kas valitsuselt lekkinud video kummipardi kujuga UFO-st on tõeline? Kas uleoo ilmunud surma kujutav jaaskulptuur on surmav mark? Saate kohtuda ka mehega, kes vaidab, et on tapnud suurjala.

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Kas USA merevae poolt hiljuti kongressile esitatud video tõestab lõplikult, et UFO-d on tõesti olemas? Kas viimased vaidetavad ulesvõtted Loch Nessi koletisest on kõige veenvamad tõendid, mis on selle olendi kohta aastate valtel saadud?

programme.title: Peale Skinwalkeri rantšo
programme.desc: Sarja "Parast tulnukate rantšot" 2. hooaja kõige põnevamad uurimised sisaldavad šokeerivaid tõendeid, hammastavat dokumentatsiooni, pooraseid katseid, veidraid nahtusi ja enneolematuid videolõike.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Tanapaeval hõlmab inimtsivilisatsioon kogu maailma ja Maal elab ule 7 miljardi inimese. Kuid kuidas tapselt on inimkond arenenud?

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Tony Harris eraldab kõige veenvamate viimasel ajal kogutud Bigfooti tõendite puhul ehtsad võltsingutest. Kas St. Helensi maelt leitud jalajaljed tõestavad, et Põhja-Ameerikas elab tohutu suur, avastamata primaat?

programme.title: Paljastatud mõistatused koos Danny Trejoga
programme.desc: Me uurime mõningaid vaartuslikumaid aardeid, mis on leitud kõige kummalisemal moel. Naiteks New Yorgi korteris peituv hindamatu Vana-Rooma mosaiik või 4 dollari eest kirbuturult ostetud vaartuslik Ameerika ajalooga seotud ese.

programme.title: Suurimad roovid Pierce Brosnaniga
programme.desc: Itaalia varaste eliitgrupp võtab sihikule Antwerpeni Maailma Teemandikeskuse varakambri. Parast 27 kuud kestnud planeerimist viivad nad oma keerulise plaani ellu ja roovivad enam kui 100 miljonit dollarit.

programme.title: Seletamatud paigad
programme.desc: Tuvastamata objektid, mida sõjavaelendurid on nainud... Maavalised sondid, mis lendavad labi meie paikesesusteemi... Kas hiljutised kummalised kohtumised ja nahtused viivad meid lahemale vastustele iidsetele kusimustele - kas oleme universumis uksi?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Kas need avastused - alates Andides peituvast kadunud linnast kuni salaparaste ebamaiste metallkeradeni ja uppunud linnani, mis vaidetavalt oli jumalate koduks - võivad olla tõendiks maavaliste kontaktide olemasolust?

programme.title: Peale Skinwalkeri rantšo
programme.desc: Sarja "Parast tulnukate rantšot" 2. hooaja kõige põnevamad uurimised sisaldavad šokeerivaid tõendeid, hammastavat dokumentatsiooni, pooraseid katseid, veidraid nahtusi ja enneolematuid videolõike.

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Kas USA merevae poolt hiljuti kongressile esitatud video tõestab lõplikult, et UFO-d on tõesti olemas? Kas viimased vaidetavad ulesvõtted Loch Nessi koletisest on kõige veenvamad tõendid, mis on selle olendi kohta aastate valtel saadud?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Poodi tuuakse Normandia invasiooni kasitsi joonistatud kaardid. Kas Corey suudab rinnet kaitsta või on sunnitud alla andma?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Varvime linna koos pandikunnidega punaseks, kui poodi tuuakse Monet maastikumaal. Ricki ajalootund Cinco de Mayo teemal ajab mehed hulluks ja võib juhtuda, et teda ei kutsuta iseenda fiestale.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Tanapaeval hõlmab inimtsivilisatsioon kogu maailma ja Maal elab ule 7 miljardi inimese. Kuid kuidas tapselt on inimkond arenenud?

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Tony Harris eraldab kõige veenvamate viimasel ajal kogutud Bigfooti tõendite puhul ehtsad võltsingutest. Kas St. Helensi maelt leitud jalajaljed tõestavad, et Põhja-Ameerikas elab tohutu suur, avastamata primaat?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Aastaid on eri kultuurides ule maailma levinud uskumus tahevaravate kohta, mille kaudu on Maale saabunud olendid universumi kaugetest punktidest ja isegi teistest dimensioonidest. Kas sellised varavad võivad tõesti eksisteerida?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick teeb uuratult hea tehingu maali eest, mille on vaidetavalt loonud kunstnik Rene Magritte. Kuid selleks, et oma leiu autentsust tuvastada, peab ta koos Chumiga Belgiasse sõitma. Kas sellest saab "Pandikunnide" ajaloo suurim palgapaev?

programme.title: Tulnukate rantšo
programme.desc: Kui Skinwalkeri rantšos viiakse labi põlisrahva helirituaal, on meeskonnaliikmed ullatunud nahtustest, mis ilmnevad.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick võitleb paari vanaaegse plakati parast, kuid kas ta võidab selle sõja? Seejarel kutsuvad Rick ja Chum appi Grayskulli, kui nad vaatavad ule suurt Battle Cati manguasja. Kas paar saab šoki kõrgest hinnast või suudab labiraakimised umber poorata?

programme.title: Bible Secrets Revealed
programme.desc: Biblical prophecies are said to be messages and warnings sent from God, but what do they really foretell? Can they be decoded and used to predict mankinds future?

programme.title: Teise maailmasõja kadunud kuld
programme.desc: Parast pommimargi leidmist kutsutakse kohale demineerija, et uurida labi koobas, mis võis sõja ajal olla kindral Yamashita staabiks. Koopast avastatakse potentsiaalne peidetud lõhkelaeng ja ka esimene mark varandusest.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: At the end of the 13th century, Scotland was a country under attack. Defeat seemed inevitable. But from nowhere emerged a man who became Scotlands greatest hero - William Wallace, commonly known as Braveheart.

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: Rick and river-searching expert Beau searching the unexplored rivers and waterways of Britain, unearthing treasures from the past which reveal how our various ancestors used to live.

programme.title: Monsterquest
programme.desc: In Texarkanas marshy swamp, a legendary beast haunts a small Arkansas town, immortalised in "The Legend of Boggy Creek". Violent nocturnal attacks and remarkable tracks left fear and panic in its wake.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Could aliens have told Joan of Arc how to beat the English army? And could a US serviceman have received a message when he touched a spaceship? Experts investigate.

programme.title: Countdown to Apocalypse
programme.desc: According to the Book of Revelation, the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse will usher in four divine judgments that promise to devastate humanity. Some believe its dark imagery is coming to fruition in modern times.

programme.title: Mummy Forensics
programme.desc: A body inside an over-sized coffin sets the team on the trail of their final mystery. What they discover is a tragic tale played out at the highest echelons of Egyptian society, set at the court of one of Egypts most famous Pharaohs.

programme.title: Templiruutlite kadunud jaanused
programme.desc: Neljas saade keskendub ohvrinõule. Carli lemmikese on taielikult marmorist valja tahutud, ideaalses seisukorras ning seda ehib neli tahutud pead.

programme.title: How the Earth was made
programme.desc: The Marianas Trench is the deepest place on earth. Follow a mission into the abyss and explore the geology that has created this deep scar along the ocean floor.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: The Great Pyramids of Giza have eluded astronomers and archeologists for centuries. The worlds renowned Egyptologists, astronomers and engineers join forces to solve some of the long-held mysteries about the pyramids.

programme.title: Battles BC
programme.desc: Discover how cornered Egyptian soldiers miraculously escaped the Hittites in one of the greatest armed battles of the ancient world.

programme.title: Impeeriumi loomine
programme.desc: The Ancient Greeks laid a foundation that supported nearly 3,000 years of European history. How did they build structures including Agamemnons Tomb and the Parthenon?

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: Discover what would happen to priceless artefacts such as the Mona Lisa, the Declaration of Independence and the Liberty Bell if humans were no longer around.

programme.title: Hitleri jalil
programme.desc: DePaul puuab Berliinis endiselt tunnelit leida. Kennedy otsib Argentinas allveelaeva. DePaul ja Williams liiguvad ringi Galicia piirkonnas ja kulastavad Vigo sadamalinna.

programme.desc: Sightings of small creatures have coincided with missing persons reports within the Alaska Triangle. Could man-eating gnomes be roaming Alaska?

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: In 47 AD, new emperor Claudius was considered by many to be an idiot. The only way for him to hang onto his throne was to invade Britannia.

programme.title: Mummy Forensics
programme.desc: In a museum in the heart of England lies a bodiless mummy. The team are called in to discover who he was and whether his death was as grizzly as it looks, and discover a story of a gilded life gone wrong.

programme.title: Digging for the Truth
programme.desc: A comprehensive look at the competing theories as to who built the pyramids and when. Does the great pyramid of Khufu hold the answers?

programme.title: UFO failid
programme.desc: In December 1980, NATO personnel stationed in England witnessed strange lights in the sky. Aliens?

programme.title: Muistse aja top 10
programme.desc: Vanaaja maailma suured impeeriumid sundisid sõjast ja kõige otsustavamaid lahinguid peeti piiramisrõngas. Uurime, milline piiramine oli kõige laastavam, kas naiteks legendaarne Trooja lahing või Rooma langemine?

programme.title: The Tesla Files
programme.desc: The team investigates Nikola Teslas final residence, The New Yorker Hotel, and find incredible evidence that it served as much more than a home to the controversial inventor.

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: What if, for the first time in 4.5 billion years, Earth was pulled out of its orbit, sending it on a collision course into the Sun? Earths 65-day deadly fall brings massive hurricanes, sandstorms and a heat wave that kills every last person.

programme.title: Project Impossible
programme.desc: Toppling giants of concrete and steel is dangerous and deadly. In demolition, one mistake can cost you your life. On this episode: imploding a casino, dismantling chemical weapons and tripping a silo.

programme.title: Foo Fighters - Live in London
programme.desc: Foo Fighters is one of the most popular bands in the world, Dave Grohl and company have traveled the world to perform at the stages of the most popular festivals in the globe. In 2011 they were invited to participate in the iTunes Festival in London. On July 11, before a fully packed Round House theater, the band gave their fans a concert of over two hours of their best music.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Eric Clapton
programme.sub-title: Eric Clapton: Live at the Royal Albert Hall
programme.desc: Eric Clapton, Live at the Royal Albert Hall captures a momentous night for one of the worlds greatest rock guitarists, celebrating his 50 years at the top of the music business and more than 200 performances at the iconic London venue that holds a special place in his heart.

programme.title: Meat Loaf - Classic Album
programme.sub-title: Meat Loaf - Classic Album: Bat Out Of Hell
programme.desc: The songs and story of this classic album with contributions by Meat Loaf, Jim Steinman, Todd Rundgren, Ellen Foley and Karla DeVito. Since its release in 1977, Bat Out of Hell has gone on to sell an estimated 30 million copies and become one of the top five biggest selling albums of all time. Released during the days of the disco boom and the advent of punk rock, Bat Out of Hell totally bucked those musical trends, yet as Meat Loaf recalls, the record is "more honest than 99% of all records released." The remarkable story of Bat Out of Hell is told here by its leading contributors, including Meat Loaf himself, composer Jim Steinman, record producer Todd Rundgren, and backing vocalists Ellen Foley and Karla DeVito, together with others who helped in the construction of Bat Out of Hells "wall of sound." Featuring archival footage, interviews and live performances, this is the compelling story of the making of one of rock musics finest hours, a true classic album.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Eric Clapton and Steve Winwood - Live from Madison Square Garden
programme.desc: History rocked and rock made history during a sold-out three-gig stand at Madison Square Garden in late February 2008 when icons Eric Clapton and Steve Winwood performed a concert together for the first time since their all-too-brief days in the legendary Blind Faith in 1969. Whether they will ever team again is unknown. But with Eric Clapton and Steve Winwood Live From Madison Square Garden fans everywhere are able to experience the sound and the glory of a performance on that famous stage by two of rocks greatest artists.

programme.title: Paul Simon - Live in New York City
programme.desc: During the first leg of Paul Simons triumphant, 2011 U.S. tour, he thrilled hometown fans with a special club performance at New York Citys historic Webster Hall. The show presents this iconic artist working at the peak of his artistic and creative powers in an unusually intimate setting. The 20-song, 90-minute set list was drawn from his legendary career and includes several songs that havent been performed live in many years. "Kodachrome," "Mother and Child Reunion," "Gone At Last" and "The Obvious Child" are just some of the highlights as well as songs from Simons most recent album, 2011s So Beautiful or So What (Hear Music/Concord Music Group) including "Dazzling Blue," "Rewrite," "The Afterlife" and the albums propulsive title track.

programme.title: Santana _ Plays The Blues
programme.sub-title: Santana _ Plays The Blues: Live at Montreux
programme.desc: July 12, 2004 was a very special night at the Montreux Festival for any blues fan. With Carlos Santana as musical director (and special guest guitarist), three musical legends took to the stage. Each one delivered a full concert set packed with some of the finest blues guitar playing youll ever hear. Bobby Parker, Clarence ""Gatemouth"" Brown and Buddy Guy are all headline acts in their own right so it was a real coup to get them on one line-up. Throw in the guest live performances by Carlos Santana and Chic maestro Nile Rodgers and blues heaven is complete!

programme.title: Ziggy Marley - Live at the Filmore
programme.desc: The Fillmore Auditorium is a historic concert hall in San Francisco, California. Founded by Bill Graham, it was named after being located originally on the corners of Fillmore Street and Geary Boulevard.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Evanescence - Synthesis Live
programme.desc: In 2003, Evanescence released Fallen, one of the most decade-defining albums (and one of the most successful debut albums of all time) and have gone on to became one of the most well-loved and respected bands of their generation. In the 15 years since their debut, Evanescence founder and lead-singer, Amy Lee, toured the world, has scored motion picture films and even took a 3 year break to start a family. In late 2017, Evanescence re-emerged from their hiatus with Synthesis—a reimagining of their best-known songs with orchestra and electronics and an accompanying sold-out and highly-acclaimed world tour. On November 3, 2017 Evanescence performed "Synthesis Live" in front of a sold out crowd at the Grand Theater at Foxwoods Casino in CT.

programme.title: Pet Shop Boys _ Live at Roskilde
programme.desc: Filmed in Roskilde, Denmark, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Pet Shop Boys featuring unforgettable version of their hits: Always On My Wind, West End Girls, "Being Boring" and many more...

programme.title: Rodrigo y Gabriela - Garorock Festival
programme.desc: The mexican duet takes the stage at Garorock Festival, in July 2014.

programme.title: Ed Sheeran _ Live in London
programme.desc: Ed Sheeran manages to make a huge venue feel like an intimate setting. With only his guitar and his incredible vocal skills, Ed puts on a great performance at the 2014 edition of the iTunes Festival, located at the Roundhouse Art Centre, in London.

programme.title: Interpol - Rock En Seine
programme.desc: Interpol is an American rock band from Manhattan, New York,[2] formed in 1997. Their original line-up consisted of Paul Banks, Daniel Kessler, Carlos Dengler and Greg Drudy.

programme.title: Foals - A Session With Foals
programme.desc: Being from the rain-ridden lands of England, Foals are used to a different kind of festival environment: generally speaking, frontman Yannis Philippakis described them as "mud and wellies" ordeals. So were sure they were quite pleased to travel halfway around the world to the California desert to perform for Coachellas music-hungry crowds. Prior to taking to the stage in Indio, however, Foals made a pit stop at our little poolside bungalow to perform a Festival Fever Session featuring songs off their highly-acclaimed, recent full-length Holy Fire. While you might have already seen the bands in-the-flesh transformation of "My Number" into a slow-burning beaut, weve expanded the session to include the subtle closer "Moon".

programme.desc: The Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival is an annual music and arts festival held at the Empire Polo Club in Indio, California, in the Coachella Valley

programme.title: David Gilmour - Remember That Night
programme.desc: David Gilmour - Remember That Night: Live at the Royal Albert Hall is recorded by guitarist David Gilmour where he presents live tracks from the album On an Island and some hits from his former band Pink Floyd.

programme.title: The Black Keys - Live at Austin City Limits
programme.desc: The Austin City Limits Music Festival is an annual music festival that takes place at Zilker Park in Austin, Texas. The festival features more than 130 bands on eight stages for three days.

programme.title: Grace Mitchell - Apple Music Festival
programme.desc: The Apple Music Festival (formerly known as the iTunes Festival) was a music concert series held by Apple, Inc. inaugurated in 2007.

programme.title: Tony Bennett - Duets II
programme.sub-title: Tony Bennett - Duets II: The Great Performances
programme.desc: Duets II: The Great Performances is a visually stunning video companion to Tony Bennetts history-making #1 album, Duets II. The DVD features the full song performances from Tony and todays greatest artists as they were recorded live in the studio. The musical segments are enhanced by insights on the process from Tony and the duet partners, providing an inside look at this landmark album in an unprecedented career. Duets II: The Great Performances is a testament to the artistry and dedication of Tony Bennett, beloved by the performers who sing with him and audiences around the world.

programme.title: Eric Clapton and Steve Winwood - Live from Madison Square Garden
programme.desc: History rocked and rock made history during a sold-out three-gig stand at Madison Square Garden in late February 2008 when icons Eric Clapton and Steve Winwood performed a concert together for the first time since their all-too-brief days in the legendary Blind Faith in 1969. Whether they will ever team again is unknown. But with Eric Clapton and Steve Winwood Live From Madison Square Garden fans everywhere are able to experience the sound and the glory of a performance on that famous stage by two of rocks greatest artists.

programme.title: Paul Simon - Live in New York City
programme.desc: During the first leg of Paul Simons triumphant, 2011 U.S. tour, he thrilled hometown fans with a special club performance at New York Citys historic Webster Hall. The show presents this iconic artist working at the peak of his artistic and creative powers in an unusually intimate setting. The 20-song, 90-minute set list was drawn from his legendary career and includes several songs that havent been performed live in many years. "Kodachrome," "Mother and Child Reunion," "Gone At Last" and "The Obvious Child" are just some of the highlights as well as songs from Simons most recent album, 2011s So Beautiful or So What (Hear Music/Concord Music Group) including "Dazzling Blue," "Rewrite," "The Afterlife" and the albums propulsive title track.

programme.title: The Pretenders - Loose In LA
programme.desc: The Pretenders have been consistently making classic albums and hit singles in a career that now spans 25 years. Lead by the charismatic Chrissie Hynde, possessor of one of the most recognisable voices in rock music, they have topped the charts on both sides of the Atlantic and in many other territories around the world. Loose In L.A. was recorded at the Wilton Theatre, Los Angeles on the US Tour for their latest album Loose Screw. The concert combines a number of tracks from the Loose Screw album with favourite album tracks and a greatest hits selection including: Talk Of The Town, Back On The Chain Gang, Dont Get Me Wrong, Kid, Ill Stand By You and their international No.1 hit Brass In Pocket.

programme.title: The day the Rock Star Died
programme.desc: David Bowie was the leading figure in popular music for over five decades. Acclaimed by critics and musicians for his innovative work. His career was marked by reinvention and visual presentation, his music and stagecraft significantly influencing popular music. During his lifetime, his record sales, estimated at 140 million albums worldwide, made him one of the bestselling music artists. He stopped concert touring after 2004 and his last live performance was at a charity event in 2006. In 2013, Bowie returned from a decade-long recording hiatus with the release of The Next Day. He remained musically active until his Death two days after the release of his final album, Blackstar.

programme.title: Sheryl Crow _ Miles From Memphis Live at the Pantages Theatre
programme.desc: Filmed in November 2010 in the palatial surroundings of the wonderful art deco Pantages Theatre in Hollywood, this concert film captures Sheryl Crow on tour in support of her recent hit album ""100 Miles From Memphis"". The set pulls tracks from across her career and is peppered with hit singles and her best loved album tracks as well as highlights from the new album. Sheryl Crow is at the top of her form and is backed by an outstanding band. Combine this with simple but elegant staging and atmospheric lighting and everything is set for a perfect evening in the company of an exceptional artist.

programme.title: Bring Me the Horizon - Reading and Leeds Festival
programme.desc: Reading and Leeds Festival 2022 - The Reading and Leeds Festivals are a pair of annual music festivals that take place in Reading and Leeds, England. The events both happen on the bank holiday weekend in August (on Friday, Saturday, Sunday), and share the same bill (occasionally with one or two exceptions). The festivals origins date to the Beaulieu Jazz Festival (1956-1961) which became the National Jazz Festival in 1961 (The National Jazz and Blues Festival in 1963) and settled in Reading in 1971. In 1999 a second leg was added at Leeds. Featuring : Bastille.

programme.title: Mees, kes jai ellu
programme.desc: Kolm Oscarit võitnud võimas seiklusdraama. On aasta 1823. Ameerika metsikul kaardistamata kõnnumaal langeb karusnahakutt Hugo Glass karu runnaku ohvriks. Tema kaaslased arvavad, et mees on surnud ja jatavad ta maha. Glass peab kokku võtma kõik oma ellujaamisoskused ja viimase kui jõuraasu, et uliraskete loodusolude ja vaenuliku keskkonna kiuste taas koju paaseda. Tema toorel tahtejõul põhineva teekonna eesmark on maksta katte reetlikule John Fitzgeraldile. Film võitis parima režissoori Oscari, lisaks võitsid Kuldmehikese Leonardo DiCaprio parima meespeaosa ja Emmanuel Lubezki parima operaatoritoo eest.

programme.title: Galápagos
programme.desc: Eraldiseisvad saared keset Vaikset ookeani, koos olenditega, kes kutsuvad seda saart koduks ja keda ei leidu kusagil mujal maailmas. Kuidas said need vahesed liigid areneda sellises tohutus mitmekesisuses, mida me Galápagose saartel naeme? "Galápagos: maailma aar" viib vaatajad Darwini evolutsiooni tõendite juurde. "Galápagos: maailma aar" uurib saari, mis on tuntud oma suure hulga endeemiliste liikide poolest ja evolutsiooni, keskkonnamuutuseid ning inimese sekkumist loodusesse UHD-formaadis elavalt jaadvustatuna.

programme.title: Jaagivaba kook

programme.title: Milderid Marokos
programme.desc: "Milderid Marokos" on kaasahaarav ja sudantsoojendav reisisaade, milles saab kaasa elada muusikute Piret Jarvis-Milderi ja Egert Milderi ning nende kahe lapse 3 kuud valdanud poorasele seiklusele Maroko Kuningriigis. Seekordses osas jõuavad Milderid Atlandi ookeani aares asuvasse Essaouira linna. Egert ja Piret mõistavad, et paralleelselt pisikeste lastega ringi reisida ja saadet filmida on võimatu, mistõttu kaaluvad reisi katkestamist. Ent viimasel hetkel ulatatakse neile ootamatu abikasi.

programme.title: Arvamusfestival
programme.sub-title: Kuberkurjategija mõtteviis: kuidas mõelda nagu hakker?
programme.desc: Digimaailmas peituvad võimalused ja ohud kasikaes. Kui varem varitses roovel meid maanteel, siis tana tegutseb ta kuberruumis - sageli tehisintellekti toel ja uha nutikamalt. Arutame ekspertidega, kuidas kubermaastik on muutunud, milliseid runnakutaktikaid enim kasutatakse ning kuidas kaitsta end nii tehnoloogiliselt kui ka seadusandlikult. Praktilised nõuanded, varsked ohupildid ja selge suunaviit juhuks, kui peaksid ise runnaku ohvriks sattuma.

programme.title: Arvamusfestival
programme.sub-title: Alati uhenduses - suurem produktiivsus või labipõlemise oht?
programme.desc: Kaasaegsed tehnoloogilised võimalused soodustavad paindlikku tooaega, ent samal ajal hagustuvad piirid too- ja eraelu vahel. Arutelu keskmes on kusimus, kuidas leida tasakaal paindliku tooaja ja labipõlemise ennetamise vahel. Kusime, milline roll on tooandjatel, tootajatel ja tehnoloogial tervislike tookultuuride kujundamisel. Paneeli eesmark on leida praktilisi lahendusi, kuidas tehnoloogiat targalt kasutada ning teha seda selliselt, et see toetaks tooviljakust, kuid võimaldaks inimestel seada selged piirid ja valtida labipõlemist.

programme.desc: Arija Helmvee ja Marii Karell Laser Techist võtavad ette sotsiaalmeediaplatvormidel levinud trendid ja vaidlevad selgeks, miks mingi asi trendib. Kas sotsiaalmeedia peaks olema noortele keelatud (10-aastased meigieksperdid, telefonikeeld koolides)? Sotsiaalmeedia kuulsuste karmim pool (MrBeast, Kanye West, P. Diddy, Elon Musk). Mõjuisikute mõju: kas ja kuidas sotsiaalmeedia tarbimine muudab noorte tarbimisharjumusi (ashwagandha, kemikaalid šampoonides, Dubai šokolaad, cancel culture jne).
